manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It's the belt that you saw on the hit series Shark Tank & Beyond the Tank. What Will You Love About A Mission Belt? - NO HOLES No worries of stretched-out, embarrassing holes ever again. - PERFECT FIT Mission Belts adjust every 1/4" unlike traditional belts that only have holes every 1”. - NO CRACKS Because the belt has no holes, it is less likely to crack under stress. And if you wear a Mission Belt you won't show your crack. Say goodbye to accidental moons. - ALWAYS FITS Even when you lose or gain a few pounds Mission Belts adjust with you for the most comfortable fit. So after that big holiday meal just loosen your belt a few clicks for quick and easy comfort. - EASY ON, EASY OFF The quick-release lever on a Mission Belt is intuitive and smooth, you’ll love the convenience for everyday use. Plus in those times like going through airport security or when you just need to make like a race horse, you’ll love how easy it is to use our belts. - INTERCHANGEABLE Mix and Match buckles and belts straps that come in Leather, Canvas, Nylon, and Italian Leather to make your own unique combinations. We offer 2 different widths of belts (35mm & 40mm) so just remember that in order to interchange the buckles and leathers, they need to be the same width (35mm buckles won’t fit 40mm leathers). - FEEL GOOD Know that you are in the fight against global poverty and hunger. One dollar from every belt sold goes to feed a family in need through KIVA. It's not just a belt... It's a MISSION BELT Upgrade Your Belts For the Whole Family. Men's, Women's and Youth Sizing Available. Buy Your Perfect Belt Today.

Standard Leather Belts Wide Leather Belts Full-Grain Italian Leather Belts Nylon Belts Canvas Belts Womens Leather Belts Strap Material Genuine Leather Genuine Leather Italian Full-Grain Leather Nylon Webbing Canvas Genuine Leather Belt Width 35mm 40mm 35mm & 40mm 40mm 40mm 30 mm Interchangeable Buckles ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Assorted Colors ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Sizes Up To a 56" Waist Up To a 56" Waist Up To a 42" Waist Up To a 56" Waist Up To a 56" Waist Up to a 42" Waist Gender Mens Mens Mens Mens Mens Womens

Comparing Your Old Belt With A Mission Belt Why Choose A Mission Belt? Standard belts are made in standard lengths with holes 1 inch apart resulting in belts that are sometimes too long, too tight, or too loose. But we all need different sizes that aren't normally 1 inch apart! Mission Belt has revolutionized the belt by removing those standard fixed buckles and holes. Our belts use a ratcheting system to allow you to customize your perfect fit by making 1/4 inch micro adjustments and we paired it with easy-to-use, stylish buckles to lock your belt in place and a quick release lever. It's time to throw away those old saggy belts and start fresh with a perfectly fitting Mission Belt.

How A Mission Belt Works Innovative Design As Seen On The Hit Show Shark Tank Using a Mission Belt is easy. The tip of the belt inserts into the ratchet belt buckle, where a locking mechanism holds the belt in place from the back. You will hear the click, click, click sound of the belt as you find the perfect fit. Did you get it too tight? Don't worry, just hold down the release lever and let out a notch or two. When you are ready to remove the belt, just press the small metal lever on the bottom of the buckle, and the belt slides right out.

How To Resize Your Mission Belt Don't Limit Yourself To Standard Belt Sizes Resizing a Mission Belt is fast and easy. Simply lift the clasp, remove the buckle, measure the length that is right for you (be sure not to cut too much) and cut the strap. Then reinsert the strap into the buckle and close the clasp. Now you have the perfect custom-sized belt for your waist.

Why Is Mission Belt The Perfect Belt? Mix & Match For Any Occasion While the classic brown and leather belts belong in every closet, don't limit your wardrobe to just the basics. Use our belts to mix & match different straps and buckles to create the perfect belt for every occasion. Be classic or bold depending on your mood. With the Mission Belt you will always show up with style. Variety Of Materials Wherever life takes you, we have the belt for you! Show up to that special occasion in our quality Italian leather belts or hold up your pants while hiking a beautiful trail with our durable Nylon belts. Choose from Full-Grain Italian Leather, Genuine Leather, Nylon, or Canvas belts in a variety of colors & sizes. The Perfect Fit With Our No Holes Design Hold your pants up with style with the Mission Belt. Get the perfect fit every time with our revolutionary no holes design. You will no longer be distracted by your pants falling down or feeling like your belt is digging into you. You will love how comfortable our belts are. Adjustable Belts Have you ever found yourself between belt sizes? Don't worry, with The Mission Belt you can adjust the length of your belt in a few easy steps to get the perfect size for you. With a belt this comfortable you will forget you are wearing it, that is until someone compliments you on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blows competitors away. Great belt, Great company!
reviews.reviewText: Mission Belt is simply the best "ratchet style" belt available. They are truly incredible. Mission Belt's customer service is outstanding. In fact, their customer service is the best of any company I have been a customer of...ever. Before ordering the belt, I emailed them with a question regarding sizing. It seems as if I am in a bit of a middle ground of waist size. I wear a consistent size 32" across the board. Based on this, I was recommended a small-sized belt, but once I received my belt and tried it on, it was just an inch or two too small for me. Again, I messaged them and once again received a nearly immediate response. They immediately sent me a medium-sized belt before I even began the process of sending back the small-sized belt. I was offered a full refund on shipping. I received the new medium sized belt in a few days and it fit perfectly. As an added bonus, they sent me a newer model black belt. It was very similar, but with a few minor upgrades. From what I could immediately tell, the ratcheting is much smoother. Mission Belt and I exchanged a few more emails to ensure that I was pleased with my purchase.Prior to ordering this belt, I had ordered three of the Erik Blaire brand ratchet belts in different colors. While this company also has great customer service from my experience and similar buckles, the belt strap is really what sets these belts apart. Mission Belts are dyed leather, as opposed to the Erik Blaire belts which are painted on patterns. This painting resulted in my belts "cracking" over just a couple of months. The Mission Belts look like leather, feel like leather...and yes even smell like leather. Some models are even labeled "yeah...its leather." I cannot say the same for their competitor. I do not want to trash the Erik Blaire Belts, because I initially did fall in love with them and their customer service was also very good from my experience, but they are simply not as nice as these. I recommend these for yourself or as a gift. I absolutely guarantee that NO ONE would be disappointed with one of these belts. Oh and one final thing, they even donate a portion of every belt sale to charity to feed the hungry. Great belt, great companyThese belts are awesome. Just order one now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Like many other reviewers have mentioned, this product was featured on Shark Tank, which is how I heard about the company. I thought it sounded like a genius idea; I hate traditional belt loops, because I always feel like I would be more comfortable between one or the other, and on some belts, the holes do begin to stretch out some over time. I've been burned by Shark Tank products before though (looked great on the show, ordered them, and they don't perform nearly as well as advertised).This has not been the case with this Mission belt. By far, this is the best belt I have ever owned or used. I chose the "Vader", the black belt with the black and chrome buckle. It arrived quickly from Amazon, and ships in a small box. The packaging is simple but adequate. I love that they include a small set of "instructions", both for how to operate the belt and also how to trim the belt shorter if you ever want to cut the excess down. Also, inside the box is a truly handwritten note from someone at Mission, thanking me for the order; a very nice touch. I also had no idea that the company donated $1 from each belt purchased to charity, which is a huge plus, and I guess the reason for the name "Mission".The packaging is nice, but you'll forget all about it once you see the belt. My first and instant reaction was that I couldn't believe how gorgeous the buckle looked and felt. It is a very solid, weighty piece of metal. It feels like you could run the buckle over with a tank and it wouldn't take a scratch, it is SOLID feeling. The leather is also of a higher quality than I expected. It's thick and feels great, and the stitching around the edges looks nice as well.As for the ratcheting mechanism of the belt, some other reviews complained about problems with it, but so far mine has been flawless. It is fun to hear that ratcheting sound every morning when I put the belt on, and even nicer to be able to get it to the exact length I want on that particular day. The release mechanism is designed very well; in a way where it is highly unlikely you'd ever activate it by accident, but it's very easy to activate intentionally with the flip of a single finger (and without needing to see it). It's hidden away on the side of the belt that faces down to the floor, which is nice because it keeps the part of the buckle you or anyone else will see looking smooth and sleek.Love this belt, and I now need to buy it in more colors and with more buckles so I can replace all of my other belts as well. I've paid more money for belts before in the past that haven't been half as nice as this in looks and certainly no where close in design. Unquestionably a five star product for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This belt came the right size. I didn’t have to cut it for the size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product and easy to use. The best belt I have ever owned. I wish I knew about these belts earlier. Definitely going to buy more color and styles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buckles are amazing... belts are a mixed bag
reviews.reviewText: Mission buckles are amazing, great looking, very durable!The belts are a mixed bag. I would avoid the 35mm wide leather belts (thinner model) as mine have all cracked within 2-3 years. I've had better luck with the 40mm nylon belts and they actual look nice enough for business-casual settings. They seem to be more durable.If Mission could upgrade the leather belt models, they would be the best belt on the market, by far. I still love 'em and still buy 'em... but I avoid the 35mm now. One star off until they sort that cracking leather issue! ;-)
Lo tuve hace muchos años atrás y me gustó , hace unos meses me propuse a comprarlo para volver a sentir esa emoción y nuevamente me volví a enamorar de mi cinturón mission belt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2020

reviews.reviewText: when ordering the disciption said the bet was 1.5inch however the width is infact 1.25inches. check incase you are buying with intention of mixing and matching with other belts/buckles owned

reviews.reviewTitle: Super Produkt, super Support! Absolute Empfehlung!
reviews.reviewText: Am 27.10.2016 habe ich mir den Mission Belt für 24,45€(!) gekauft, nachdem ich die Serie Shark Tank im TV gesehen habe.Ich war immer super zufrieden und wollte nie mehr einen anderen Gürtel nutzen.Dann ist vor wenigen Tagen leider eine Verbindung in der Gürtelschnalle gebrochen und seit dem ist der Gürtel halt kaputt. Der Schaden ist nicht groß, ich bin mir sicher, dass man da einfach zwei Nieten reinkloppen kann und das Teil ist wieder wie neu. Da ich auf die Schnelle jedoch kein passendes Werkzeug auftreiben konnte, habe ich die Website von Mission Belt aufgerufen. Dort habe ich dem Support die Situation per Chat geschildert und freundlich gefragt, was ich jetzt machen soll. Aufpassen, True Story!Binnen Sekunden kam eine Antwort!Sie baten mich um einen Screenshot der Amazon Bestellung. Diesen habe ich dann per E-Mail verschickt und umgehend dir Info erhalten, dass mir eine neue Gürtelschnalle zugeschickt wird!KOSTENFREI natürlich!!! Aus AMERIKA!!! WTF!!! 👍Mission Belt ist der beste Gürtel den ich je hatte und ich will auch keinen anderen mehr haben!Nach der geschilderten Erfahrung die ich mit dem Support von Mission Belt gemacht habe, würde ich heute wahrscheinlich sogar die überteuerten 95€ dafür bezahlen!
Increíble el mejor tipo de cinturón que he llegado a tener en mi vida. No me arrepiento para nada de haberlo comprado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 25, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent quality belt with great fit
reviews.reviewText: I now own 4 of these belts, the first 2 I've had for almost a year and the quality is excellent. The fit is great (I have the 'custom' 56 size, being a big guy) and am really pleased. This order was for the burgundy colour, bought to colour match a pair of oxblood Gucci loafers. I was a bit apprehensive as the colour on screen looked to be quite a rich hue of burgundy, moving towards purple, but in reality the colour is not as on screen, it is darker and is a perfect match to the shoes, so I'm really happy. I contacted the seller once I'd ordered since the delivery time (coming from USA) was approx. a month, and I needed the belt for an event, asking if it could be expedited. They replied immediately and said they'd see what they could do. I ordered on 13/04/18 and the belt arrived today, 25/04/18 well ahead of the delivery estimate. Really happy with the service and the quality of the items.
